judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The Court being evenly divided, the judgment of the lower court is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Murray R. Garber and R. T. Mutzabaugh, with them Joseph Graff, for appellants.
James F. Mc'Vay, with him McYay and MoYay, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Jordan v. Nichols, Appellant.
Argued October 7, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
December 30, 1959:
reargument refused February 23, 1960.
Murray R. Garber and R. T. Mutzabaugh, with them Joseph Graff, for appellants.
James F. Mc'Vay, with him McYay and MoYay, for appellee.
